alert.note: Alert for Montgomery (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 04 at 4:43PM CDT by NWS Birmingham
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Montgomery County through 515 PM CDT... At 443 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over northwestern Montgomery, moving west at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Montgomery, Hunter, Montgomery Zoo, Boylston, Hyundai Motors Of Alabama, Alabama State University, Hope Hull, Woodcrest, Dannelly Field, Maxwell Air Force Base, Montgomery Riverwalk Stadium, Lagoon Park, Gunter Air Force Base and Alabama State Capitol. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
